Posted By: GruesomeGoo (10/1/2012 12:03:28 PM)
Rating:

posts.post_content:
How totally random. As another member stated, random power and toughness vanilla creatures seems to be a theme this set. I have no idea how a 2/6 represents a huge slug, but whatever.  
  
It would have been interesting to give it "last strike" but make it huge, or some other silly ability that at least made sense for slugs even if the end result was equally underwhelming. So, now we have a slug that needs two Hill Giants to kill?!
posts.html:
How totally random. As another member stated, random power and toughness vanilla creatures seems to be a theme this set. I have no idea how a 2/6 represents a huge slug, but whatever.

It would have been interesting to give it "last strike" but make it huge, or some other silly ability that at least made sense for slugs even if the end result was equally underwhelming. So, now we have a slug that needs two Hill Giants to kill?!
